Truveri makes internet security simple. 

Truveri is a anti phishing browser extension that is used to eliminate most phishing attempts. Truveri for Chrome offers real-time feedback to help you verify what your about to click is where you want to go .

➤ How it works
When you hover over a site that you verified in your system the truveri check mark pops up. When you hover over a unverified site a question mark pops up. 

Its that simple. 

➤ Truveri works where you are
Truveri is designed to seamlessly integrate into your browser—no copying or pasting required. You can use it across the entire web and it works on every website you visit. 

The team at Truveri was tired of people getting taken advantage of daily by ruthless hackers. We decided to develop a software that will verify where your headed is where you want to go.  

We’ve added hundreds of the most popular websites in the world with more being added daily . 

Now you can click with confidence and get your Freedom back!

Download Truveri today.
